<template>
      <ag-grid-vue
        style="width: 100%; height: 100%"
        class="ag-theme-balham-dark"
        :defaultColDef="defaultColDef"
        :columnDefs="columnDefs"
        :rowData="rowData"
        
        :rowDragManaged="true"
        :animateRows="true"
        @grid-ready="onGridReady"
      >
      </ag-grid-vue>
</template>
<!-- :getRowHeight="getRowHeight" -->
<script setup lang="ts">
import "ag-grid-community/dist/styles/ag-grid.css";
import "ag-grid-community/dist/styles/ag-theme-balham-dark.css";
import { AgGridVue } from "ag-grid-vue3"
import { ref }  from 'vue'
    const columnDefs = ref([
        { headerName: "Pair", field: "pair", rowDrag: true },
        { headerName: "Last Price", field: "lastPrice", valueFormatter: currencyFormatter  },
        { headerName: "24h Change", field: "chg_perc" },
        { headerName: "24h High", field: "high" },
        { headerName: "24h Low", field: "low" },
    ])
    const rowData = ref([
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 },
        { pair: 'SAND', lastPrice: 1455, chg_perc: 4.5, high: 18.3, low: 10.02 },
        { pair: 'ADA', lastPrice: 69500, chg_perc: 9, high: 72.2, low: 69.099 },
        { pair: 'MATIC', lastPrice: 2223, chg_perc: 15, high: 2.8, low: 1.92 }
    ])

    const defaultColDef = ref({
        // width: 150,
        sortable: true,
        resizable: true,
        filter: false,
    })

    // const getRowHeight = () => {
    //     return 32
    // }

    function currencyFormatter(params: any) {
        return '$' + formatNumber(params.value);
    }

    function formatNumber(number: number) {
        // debugger
        // this puts commas into the number eg 1000 goes to 1,000,
        // i pulled this from stack overflow, i have no idea how it works
        const val = Math.floor(number)
            .toString()
            .replace(/(\d)(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, '$1.');

        return val
    }
    const gridApi = ref()
    const onGridReady = (params) => {
        gridApi.value = params.api
        gridApi.value.sizeColumnsToFit();
    }
    
</script>

<style>
.ag-root-wrapper {
    border: solid 0px;
    border-radius: 2px;
    border-color: var(--ag-border-color, #30363d) !important;
}

</style>
